lead_paragraph: Sean Henry, the president of Tennessee's NHL team, is stunned he even has to explain why he hopes state legislators will snub bills similar to North Carolina's transgender bathroom law, which has consumed that state for months and scared off businesses and sporting events.

headline.main: In Red States, Businesses Gearing Up to Fight Bathroom Bills
headline.print_headline: In Red States, Businesses Gearing Up to Fight Bathroom Bills
